article_title: More Price Warnings On Hospital-Led Mergers

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: As hospitals buy more doctor practices, medical groups and other health facilities, “higher total expenditures per patient,” are often the result, according to new research in this week’s Journal of the American Medical Association. The study showed doctor practices owned by hospitals in California “incurred higher expenditures” for commercially insured HMO [...]
